Package com.irurueta.numerical.optimization

Interface OnIterationCompletedListener

public interface OnIterationCompletedListener
Notifies of events generated by an optimizer.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onIterationCompleted(Optimizer optimizer, int iteration, Integer maxIterations)
    Called when an iteration is completed.

  • Method Details

    • onIterationCompleted

      void onIterationCompleted(Optimizer optimizer, int iteration, Integer maxIterations)
      Called when an iteration is completed.
      Parameters:
      optimizer - optimizer that raised the event.
      iteration - number of iterations that have been executed.
      maxIterations - maximum number of iterations to be executed, or null if unknown.
